title: Indy, the Dog From Horror Movie ‘Good Boy,’ Asks Oscars to Consider Animal Actors: ‘Throw Us a Bone’ (EXCLUSIVE)
summary: In an unprecedented awards season move, indie studio IFC has unleashed an open letter to the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences — signed by none other than Indy, the breakout canine star of “Good Boy.” The letter, humorous yet heartfelt, calls for the inclusion of animal actors in the Osca…

title: Concerns grow after spate of social media posts showing SpaceX Starlink satellites burning in the sky — we are currently seeing a ‘couple of satellite re-entries a day,’ says respected astrophysicist
summary: An astrophysicist interview underlines the growing risk of satellites, from the increasingly crowded skies, falling to Earth.
